Class Japi2List

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JScrollPane
            • de.japi.components.Japi2List
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants

    public class Japi2List
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
    A simple list component. This component already contains scroll bars.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
